dialogues.text: Hey hey hey.. you're a natural at this kid!
Oh.. thanks! But really, it's nothing much, I just learned from the best ;D
And it's also 'best' not to stroke her ego that much.
Anyways, I oughta hire you kid! If ever you decide to stay here and are looking for some work, you know where to find me.
I'll keep that in mind. But I think I first wanna focus on graduating first TwT. Thanks for the offer though!
That you do kid. Goodluck to you on your studies, and to me cuz I gotta get back to work now. Do enjoy the rest of your stay~ <3
